OOC: yep, he robot mode is like Inferno (BW) and like him he can fly.

BIC:
"I will help" said with sorrow the male while he came in the cave "I 
haven't anything to come back my colony... she's gone and I'm guilty 
I should have stayed there and odl-betrayal-bot hadn't killed her I 
just hope that her spark can forgive me one day my dumpness...  "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: can Termitron fly?
> 
> ::Lynxiz::
> "My ...Queen... awaits me where ever she is, and I intend to seek 
> her out." Lynxiz wonders wether the leader of her faction is female 
> of male... "Will you come and help me find my ...Queen?" Lynxiz 
> enters the cave, then sits down on a eroded ledge that was acting 
> like a bench.
> 
> On 27 Feb 2001, at 5:13, airly2000@y... wrote:
> 
> > Termitron::
> > 
> > Termitron followed her. "Where's your colony???" asked the 
bot "Have 
> > you lost your queen too?"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > ::Lynxiz::
> > > "Join me in finding my allies, we are sitting ducks here. 
Follow me 
> > > to the cave just down there," She points down the mountain, 
then 
> > > starts to walk towards the cave. "Come..."
> > > 
> > > 
> > > On 27 Feb 2001, at 1:21, airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > 
> > > > Termitron::
> > > > "She's avenged..!!! She's avenged!!!!"cried Termitron "The 
bird-
> > bot 
> > > > and aero-bot were fighting against colony's enemies out side 
> > while 
> > > > Betrayal-old-bot attemped kill her, Your Majesty was 
> > defenless 'cause 
> > > > bretayal-old-bot shot her before!!!! I liked kill him but, 
Areo-
> > bot 
> > > > wanted a trial to Betrayal-old-bot, he locked him down but 
> > BEtrayal-
> > > > old bot ran away and killed her, he said "She's dead"... I 
killed 
> > > > him... She was a young queen, she couldn't fight so good and 
in 
> > spite 
> > > > that she risked her life in the first New-colony fight... and 
> > she's 
> > > > dead.... "
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > > > ::Lynxiz::
> > > > > "I... I'm sorry to hear that," replies Lynxiz softly, "Who 
is 
> > the 
> > > > > Queen?" Then thoughtfully, "The Queen must be your 
leader... 
> > you 
> > > > > should find allies and avenge your Queen's death."
> > > > >

> > > > > 
> > > > > > Termitron:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "Faction??? Faction???... I'm Termitron I'm... "he 
interruped 
> > > > > > himself "I was a loyal warrior of the Queen... "he 
shouted 
> > with 
> > > > > > sorrow"SHe's dead!!! she's dead!!!! without her colony 
isn't 
> > > > > > worthy...not worthy... "
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Termitron hadn't comfort "I arrived too late to help 
her... 
> > too 
> > > > late"
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > > > > > OOC: Lynxiz is on the top of a mountain in the Rockies, 
btw.

> > > > > > > Lynxiz, having noticed the approaching bot, but not 
> > initially 
> > > > > > turning 
> > > > > > > around, now does so. "I am Lynxiz, who are you, and 
what is 
> > > > your 
> > > > > > > faction?" Lynxiz eyes the bot warily.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > On 26 Feb 2001, at 23:51, airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Termitron:
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Termitron walked crying and shouting his sorrow when 
> > > > something 
> > > > > > > > captured his attention (The pod), he walked and 
looked 
> > > > curious to 
> > > > > > > > Linxiz.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > By a second, Termitron forgot his sorrow and asked 
> > > > her "Who're 
> > > > > > you?"
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > > > > > > > Creaking and sound of rocks and pine needles fill 
the 
> > > > > > surrounding 
> > > > > > > > > area as a mettalic semi-circular covering of a long 
> > lost 
> > > > pod 
> > > > > > opens 
> > > > > > > > > slowly and cautiously from the debris to the crisp 
cold 
> > air 
> > > > of 
> > > > > > the 
> > > > > > > > > Rockies. A curious black head with brown eyes 
appears 
> > > > through 
> > > > > > > > > the opening first awakening to a world of 
> > white. "Whoa... 
> > > > where 
> > > > > > am 
> > > > > > > > > I?" The bot pushes the cover the rest of the way 
off of 
> > the 
> > > > pod 
> > > > > > and 
> > > > > > > > > gets out. "I'd better find my allies quickly," says 
the 
> > bot 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > > > herself, 
> > > > > > > > > "I know, I'll send out an encrypted signal." The 
bot 
> > > > transforms 
> > > > > > > > into 
> > > > > > > > > a lynx and sprints to the top of the mountain she 
is 
> > on. 
> > > > Soon, 
> > > > > > a 
> > > > > > > > > encrypted signal on the Maximal frequency starts 
coming 
> > > > from 
> > > > > > the 
> > > > > > > > > top of a mountain in the Rockies: 
> > > > > > > > > # Maximals, I am Lynxiz and I am in need of 
assistance. 
> > I 
> > > > am 
> > > > > > not 
> > > > > > > > > sure where I am othat than a mountain. You should 
be 
> > able 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > > > > locate me with your computers with the location. # 
> > > > > > > > > "Now I will wait." She finishes.
